breasts may be tender as the 
milk is still being produced. 
Wearing	a	firm,	supportive,	
well-fitting	bra	may	help.	
Your breasts will reduce in 
size in a week or so. Speak to 
your midwife if you are very 
uncomfortable.
Your abdomen
Your abdominal muscles 
will probably be quite loose 
after delivery. Despite having 
delivered your baby plus the 
placenta	and	a	lot	of	fluid,	
you will still be quite a lot 
bigger than you were before 
pregnancy. This is partly
